        Parameters:
        f - File to use as the configuration file (Please use Launch.getConfD()'s directory to keep all of your conf files)

      • Configuration

        public Configuration(java.io.InputStream f)

        Parameters:
        f - An InputStream which contains configuration information.

        Parameters:
